text_settings_showadd: Nuna maballin "ƙara" a cikin manyan fayiloli
text_question_merge: Ci alamun shafi na yanzu tare da alamunda aka shigo dasu ko maye gurbin su?
text_importexport_content: Anan zaka iya shigo da fitarwa alamun shafi a cikin tsarin Netscape.
text_error_loadfile: kuskure: ba zai iya ɗaukar fayil ba.
text_help_content1: Manajan Alamomin shafi aikace-aikace ne wanda ke taimakawa wajen adanawa da shirya alamomin intanet.
text_help_content2: Don ƙirƙirar sabon alamar shafi, ko sabon babban fayil, latsa alamar "ƙari": zaɓi tsakanin alamar shafi da babban fayil, saka taken kuma ƙarshe URL ɗin, sannan danna adana don adana canje-canje, ko latsa share don share alamar, ko dawo don tsallake canje-canje amma kiyaye alamar.
text_help_content3: Latsa maballin "buɗe" kusa da alamar shafi don buɗe URL ɗin da ya dace.
text_help_content4: Latsa maballin "ƙara" a cikin babban fayil don ƙara sabon abu a ciki.
text_help_content5: Ga alamun shafi biyu da manyan fayiloli, latsa maɓallin "shirya" don gyaggyara su, latsa maɓallin "matsa baya" don musanya matsayi tare da ɓangaren da ya gabata, latsa maɓallin "matsa gaba" don musanya matsayi tare da na gaba, danna maballin "matsa sama" don matsar da abun daga cikin babban fayil dinda yake a halin yanzu, ko latsa maɓallin "matsa ƙasa" don matsar da ɓangaren a cikin ƙaramin fayil mai zuwa.
text_help_content6: A cikin menu na saitunan, mai sauƙi bayan danna kan gunkin "saituna", zaku iya ɓoye ko nuna gyare-gyare, motsi da maɓallan ƙari. Hakanan yana yiwuwa a sauya yaren mai amfani da shi.
text_help_content7: Don shigo ko fitarwa alamun shafi, latsa gunkin shigowa / fitarwa. Tsarin Alamar Alamar HTML Netscape yana da goyan baya, saboda haka yana yiwuwa a shigo da alamomin da manyan masu binciken yanar gizo suka fitar. Lokacin shigo da alamun shafi daga fayil, alamun shafi na yanzu za'a share su kuma za'a sake rubuta su.
text_help_content8: Manajan Alamomin Alamomi Aikace-aikacen Yanar Gizon Ci Gaban ne, wanda ke nufin yana gudanar da shi a cikin mai bincike. Lokacin da ka girka shi, yayin da ba a nuna abubuwan binciken ba, har yanzu yana gudana a cikin mai bincike. Alamun shafi an adana su a cikin adreshin mai bincike don yankin alamomin.marcoparrone.com. LocalStorage na aiki lafiya tare da masu bincike na Chrome, Edge da Firefox. Wasu masu bincike zasu iya shareShagon gida bayan wani lokaci. Android ta tsoho yana amfani da Chrome, Windows ta tsoho yana amfani da Edge. Manajan Alamomin shafi a halin yanzu ba a tallafawa kan samfuran Apple. Tare da manufar taimakawa don hana asarar alamun shafi, ana ba da shawarar yin ajiyar ajiya ta amfani da aikin "fitarwa", duk lokacin da kuka yi wasu gyare-gyare waɗanda ba ku son rasawa.
text_about_content3: AN BAYAR DA SOFTWARE "KAMAR YADDA", BATARE DA GARANTIN KOWANE IRIN, MAGANA KO AIKI BA, HAR DA BAYA KASANCEWA DA GASKIYAR SANA'AR SAMUN KYAUTA, KYAUTA WAJEN SANA'U DA RASHIN YIN RASHI. BABU WANI ABU DA ZAI YI WA MALAMAI KO MASU KWADAYI A CIKIN KWADAYI DUK WANI LAIFI, LALACEWA KO SAURAN LAYYA, KO A HANYAR KWAQIQI, TAUYA KO WATA, TA FITO DAGA, TA WAJE KO TA HADAWA DA SOFTWARE KO AMFANI KO SAURAN MAGANA SOFTWARE.
text_about_content4: WANNAN HIDIMAR NA KUNSAN FASSARA DA GOOGLE YAYI MAKA. GOOGLE YAYI FADAR DUK WATA GARDADI DANGANE DA FASSARA, FAHIMCI KO AIKI, HAR DA KOWANE GARANTI NA KASANCEWA, AMINCI, DA KOWANE GARANTI NA HARKAR MAGANA, KYAUTA A BANGAREN NUFIN DA NON.
text_about_content5: An fassara wannan ƙa'idodin yanar gizon don saukakawarku ta amfani da software na fassarar da Google Translate ke bayarwa. Anyi ƙoƙari mai ma'ana don samar da ingantacciyar fassara, kodayake, babu fassarar atomatik mai kyau kuma ba ana nufin maye gurbin masu fassarar ɗan adam ba. An bayar da fassarori a matsayin sabis ga masu amfani da gidan yanar gizon marcoparrone.com, kuma ana bayar da su "kamar yadda yake." Babu wani garantin kowane iri, ko dai an bayyana ko a bayyane, da aka yi game da daidaito, aminci, ko daidaito na duk fassarar da aka yi daga Ingilishi zuwa kowane yare. Wasu abubuwan ciki (kamar su hotuna, bidiyo, Filashi, da dai sauransu) ƙila ba za a fassara su daidai saboda iyakance software ɗin fassarar.
text_about_content6: Rubutun aikin hukuma shine shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi. Duk wani bambancin ra'ayi ko bambance-bambance da aka kirkira a cikin fassarar ba abin ɗaurawa bane kuma ba shi da wani tasiri na doka don bin doka ko dalilai na tilastawa. Idan wasu tambayoyi sun taso dangane da daidaiton bayanin da ke cikin gidan yanar gizon da aka fassara, koma zuwa shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi wanda shine fasalin hukuma.
